description: To vary condition 2 attached to 13F/2313 (To erect 31 no. retail units (A1), 7 no. restaurant units (A3). retain and remodeling units with landscaping, parking, access and highway works) So as to allow changes to the size, number and layout of retail and restaurant units and reconfigure internal road and parking layout on land to the west of Montrose Way and to consider as a separate phase of development (The Western Quarter).  *Amended plans received*
site_address: Edge Lane Retail Park , Montrose Way , Liverpool , L13
wards: Childwall, Kensington and Fairfield, Old Swan, Picton
